page.title: 12RELIGION IN STOCKSBRIDGE
page.content: THE PARISH CHURCH IS ST. MARY'S IN THE VILLAGE OF BOLSTERSTONE. THERE ARE 200 REGULAR ATTENDERS WITH AN AVERAGE OF 100 EACH SUNDAY. ON MANCHESTER ROAD IS ANOTHER C OF E CHURCH ST. MATHIAS WHOSE INCUMBENT IS ALSO A VICAR. ATTENDERS ARE 140 WITH A SUNDAY AVERAGE OF 100. ANOTHER CHURCH IN THE PARISH OF BOLSTERSTONE IS THE CHRISTIAN CENTRE ON CEDAR ROAD. IT IS PART OF AN ECUMENICAL PROJECT IN THE CARE OF TWO MINISTERS, A METHODIST MINISTER AND AN ANGLICAN VICAR. OTHER CHURCHES IN STOCKSBRIDGE ARE THE UNITED REFORM CHURCH, SALVATION ARMY CITADEL AND PENTECOSTAL CHURCH.
